title: Photonic-chip-based radio-frequency spectrum analyser with terahertz bandwidth
title_cn: 太赫兹带宽的基于光子芯片的射频频谱分析仪
abstract: Signal processing at terahertz speeds calls for an enormous leap in bandwidth beyond the current capabilities of electronics, for which practical operation is currently limited to tens of gigahertz. This can be achieved through all-optical schemes making use of the ultrafast response of χ(3) nonlinear waveguides. Towards this objective, we have developed compact planar rib waveguides based on As2S3 glass, providing a virtual ‘lumped’ high nonlinearity in a monolithic platform capable of integrating multiple functions. Here, we apply it to demonstrate, for the first time, a photonic-chip-based, all-optical, radio-frequency spectrum analyser with the performance advantages of distortion-free, broad measurement bandwidth (>2.5 THz) and flexible wavelength operation (that is, colourless). The key to this is the waveguide's high optical nonlinearity and dispersion-shifted design. Using the device, we characterize high-bit-rate (320 Gb s−1) optical signals impaired by various distortions. The demonstrated ultrafast, broadband capability highlights the potential for integrated chip-based signal processing at bit rates approaching and beyond Tb s−1.
abstract_cn: 以太赫兹速度进行信号处理需要带宽的巨大飞跃，超越了当前电子设备的能力，目前电子设备的实际操作仅限于数十兆赫兹。这可以通过利用＆＃967; （3）非线性波导的超快响应的全光学方案来实现。为了实现这一目标，我们开发了基于As 2 S 3 玻璃的紧凑型平面肋形波导，提供了虚拟的“集总”。具有集成多种功能的整体平台中的高非线性。在这里，我们将其首次用于展示基于光子芯片的全光学射频频谱分析仪，该分析仪具有无失真，宽测量带宽（＆gt; 2.5＆＃160; THz）的性能优势。 ）和灵活的波长操作（即无色）。关键在于波导的高光学非线性和色散位移设计。使用该设备，我们可以表征由于各种失真而受损的高比特率（320＆＃160; Gb＆＃160; s ＆＃8722; 1 ）光信号的特征。事实证明，超快的宽带能力凸显了以接近或超过Tb s ＆＃8722; 1 的比特率进行基于芯片的集成信号处理的潜力。

title: STED microscopy reveals crystal colour centres with nanometric resolution
title_cn: STED显微镜揭示具有纳米分辨率的晶体色心
abstract: Because they have spin states that can be optically polarized and detected, fluorescent nitrogen vacancies in diamond have considerable potential for applications in quantum cryptography and computation, as well as for nanoscale magnetic imaging and biolabelling. However, their optical detection and control are hampered by the diffraction resolution barrier of far-field optics. Here, we show that stimulated emission depletion (STED) microscopy is capable of imaging nitrogen-vacancy centres with nanoscale resolution and Ångström precision using focused light. The far-field optical control of the population of their excited state at the nanoscale expands the versatility of these centres and demonstrates the suitability of STED microscopy to image dense colour centres in crystals. Nitrogen-vacancy defects show great potential as tags for far-field optical nanoscopy because they exhibit nearly ideal STED without bleaching. Measured point-spread functions of 5.8 nm in width demonstrate an all-physics-based far-field optical resolving power exceeding the wavelength of light by two orders of magnitude.
abstract_cn: 由于钻石中的自旋态可以被光学极化和检测，因此钻石中的荧光氮空位在量子密码学和计算以及纳米级磁成像和生物标记中具有巨大的潜力。然而，它们的光学检测和控制受到远场光学器件的衍射分辨率障碍的阻碍。在这里，我们显示受激发射耗竭（STED）显微镜能够使用聚焦光以纳米级分辨率和＆nbsp; ngstr＆m精度对氮空位中心进行成像。纳米级激发态种群的远场光学控制扩展了这些中心的多功能性，并证明了STED显微镜适用于对晶体中的密集色中心成像。氮空位缺陷作为远场光学纳米显微镜的标签显示出巨大的潜力，因为它们显示出几乎理想的STED而不会漂白。测得的宽度为5.8＆＃160; nm的点扩展函数表明，基于全物理学的远场光学分辨能力超过光的波长两个数量级。

title: A metamaterial solid-state terahertz phase modulator
title_cn: 超材料固态太赫兹相位调制器
abstract: Over the past two decades, terahertz time-domain spectroscopy and quantum-cascade lasers have been two of the most important developments in terahertz science and technology. These technologies may contribute to a multitude of terahertz applications that are currently under investigation globally. However, the devices and components necessary to effectively manipulate terahertz radiation require substantial development beyond what has been accomplished to date. Here we demonstrate an electrically controlled planar hybrid metamaterial device that linearly controls the phase of terahertz radiation with constant insertion loss over a narrow frequency band. Alternatively, our device may operate as a broadband terahertz modulator because of the causal relation between the amplitude modulation and phase shifting. We perform terahertz time-domain spectroscopy, in which our hybrid metamaterial modulator replaces a commercial mechanical optical chopper, demonstrating comparable broadband performance and superior high-speed operation.
abstract_cn: 在过去的二十年中，太赫兹时域光谱学和量子级联激光器已经成为太赫兹科学和技术领域最重要的两个发展。这些技术可能有助于目前正在全球范围内进行研究的太赫兹应用。但是，有效地控制太赫兹辐射所必需的设备和部件需要远远超过迄今为止已完成的开发。在这里，我们演示了一种电控平面混合超材料设备，该设备可线性控制太赫兹辐射的相位，并且在狭窄的频带上具有恒定的插入损耗。或者，由于幅度调制和相移之间的因果关系，我们的设备可以用作宽带太赫兹调制器。我们执行太赫兹时域光谱，其中我们的混合超材料调制器替代了商用机械光学斩波器，证明了可比的宽带性能和出色的高速运行。

title: Terahertz field enhancement by a metallic nano slit operating beyond the skin-depth limit
title_cn: 通过金属纳米缝隙超出皮肤深度极限来增强太赫兹场
abstract: The unique optical properties of metals are at the core of many areas of research and applications, including plasmonics, metamaterials, superlensing and subdiffraction focusing, optical antennas and surface enhanced Raman scattering. One important length scale inherent in metamaterials and plasmonics research activities in the microwave, terahertz, infrared, visible and ultraviolet ranges is the skin depth of metal, which remains at the submicrometre level throughout the broad spectral range. One prominent question is whether terahertz electromagnetic waves can be controlled on the nanoscale to achieve new functionalities in the sub-skin-depth regime. Here, we show that a λ/30,000 slit on metal film acts as a nanogap-capacitor charged by light-induced currents, enhancing the electric field by orders of magnitudes.
abstract_cn: 金属的独特光学特性是许多研究和应用领域的核心，包括等离子体，超材料，超透镜和亚衍射聚焦，光学天线和表面增强拉曼散射。 在微波，太赫兹，红外，可见光和紫外线范围内，超材料和等离子学研究活动固有的一个重要的长度尺度是金属的趋肤深度，其在整个广谱范围内保持在亚微米水平。 一个突出的问题是，是否可以在纳米尺度上控制太赫兹电磁波，从而在亚皮深范围内实现新的功能。 在这里，我们表明，在金属膜上的一个＆＃955; / 30,000缝隙被光感应电流充电，充当了一个纳米间隙电容器，从而将电场增强了几个数量级。

title: Stereometamaterials
abstract: The subdiscipline of chemistry that studies molecular structures in three dimensions is called stereochemistry. One important aspect of stereochemistry is stereoisomers: materials with the same chemical formula but different spatial arrangements of atoms within molecules. The relative positions of atoms have great influence on the properties of chemical substances. Here, in analogy to stereoisomers in chemistry, we propose a new concept in nanophotonics, namely stereometamaterials, which refer to metamaterials with the same constituents but different spatial arrangements. As a model system of stereometamaterials, we theoretically and experimentally study meta-dimers, which consist of a stack of two identical split-ring resonators in each unit cell with various twist angles. The interplay of electric and magnetic interactions plays a crucial role for the optical properties. Specifically, the influence of higher-order electric multipoles becomes clearly evident. The twisting of stereometamaterials offers a way to engineer complex plasmonic nanostructures with a tailored electromagnetic response.
abstract_cn: 研究分子三维结构的化学子学科称为立体化学。立体化学的一个重要方面是立体异构体：具有相同化学式但分子内原子的空间排列不同的材料。原子的相对位置对化学物质的性质影响很大。在这里，类似于化学中的立体异构体，我们提出了纳米光子学中的一个新概念，即立体元材料，它是指具有相同成分但空间排列不同的超材料。作为立体超材料的模型系统，我们在理论上和实验上研究了元二聚体，它由在每个晶胞中具有不同扭转角的两个相同的开口环谐振器的堆叠组成。电磁相互作用的相互作用对于光学性质起着至关重要的作用。具体而言，高阶电多极的影响变得显而易见。立体超材料的扭曲提供了一种工程化的，具有定制的电磁响应的等离子纳米结构的方法。

title: III-nitride photonic-crystal light-emitting diodes with high extraction efficiency
title_cn: 提取效率高的III族氮化物光子晶体发光二极管
abstract: Light-emitting diodes are becoming an increasingly attractive alternative to conventional light sources due to their small size, high efficiency and long lifetime. Ongoing research is dedicated to improving their performance through the use of more efficient light-generating and light-extracting structures. Here, we demonstrate light-emitting diodes achieving high extraction efficiency by using photonic crystals. The structures are iii-nitride thin-film light-emitting diodes emitting at λ = 450 nm. The photonic-crystal layer provides superior optical mode control compared to conventional iii-nitride light-emitting diodes, efficiently coupling guided modes out of the light-emitting diode. Fabry–Perot and photonic-crystal induced modes are observed in the far-field radiation patterns and are matched to theoretical electromagnetic calculations. The optical mode control results in a high-performance light-emitting diode with an estimated unencapsulated light extraction of ∼73%, higher than any unencapsulated iii-nitride light-emitting diode measured to date.
abstract_cn: 发光二极管由于其小尺寸，高效率和长寿命而正成为常规光源的越来越有吸引力的替代品。正在进行的研究致力于通过使用更有效的光产生和光提取结构来改善其性能。在这里，我们演示了通过使用光子晶体实现高提取效率的发光二极管。该结构是在＆＃955;＆＃160; =＆＃160; 450＆＃160; nm发射的iii-氮化物薄膜发光二极管。与常规的iii-氮化物发光二极管相比，光子晶体层提供了卓越的光学模式控制，从而将导引模式有效地耦合出了发光二极管。在远场辐射图中观察到了Fabry Perot和光子晶体的诱导模式，并与理论电磁计算相匹配。光学模式控制可产生一种高性能的发光二极管，其估计的未封装光提取率为＆＃8764; 73％，比迄今为止测得的任何未封装的iii-氮化物发光二极管都要高。
